text: 2.2: Sng 34.8; Mt 18.3; Mk 10.15; 1 Ko 3.2; 14.20; Ef 4.15-16; Hi 5.12-13; 6.5Nza khueŋ kaŋgi, niamuuŋ ntigera ruagi tar, ana guigira ta vuzvugi. Mba tɨvara, nde guigira Fhe Bakɨme han kega zi ta nde guigira ana vuzvugiri. Ana bigɨna mbatɨga the anan ki fhuvara. Mba khesharigi ta, ana nden ntuur kurkurigim, nta thɨgɨ havhargip ŋkasŋkagip, Fhe Bakɨme nde nɨɨŋgi kɨrɨ tɨvar kama zɨn ŋgɨrga. Nde maaŋ muuŋv, zumgum Fhe Bakɨme phorgɨp nzerara kɨrga.
